properties.entry: SELECT POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_FILE_RENAME FROM POST P JOIN POST_FILE ON (P.POST_NO = POST_FILE.POST_NO) WHERE P.POST_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_TITLE LIKE '노하우%'

SELECT POST_TITLE ,NAME ,POST_FILE_RENAME ,POST_CONTENT ,PCOM_CONTENT FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER ON (P.USER_NO = MEMBER.USER_NO) JOIN POST_FILE ON (POST_FILE.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) JOIN POST_COMMENT ON (P.USER_NO = POST_COMMENT.USER_NO) WHERE P.POST_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_TITLE LIKE '노하우%'
